senbillnelson1877023652501151950.content: My heart goes out to those affected by the Palisades Fire in Southern California. Many in our NASA family, including our teams at Armstrong and JPL, are affected. Grace and I are praying for their safety and the safety of the first responders battling the blaze.
senbillnelson1877023652501151950.author: senbillnelson

senbillnelson1846182827106193507.content: We live in the golden age of space exploration—the age of international partnerships. Nations united in the quest for knowledge, in the cause of discovery, and in the name of peace.
senbillnelson1846182827106193507.author: senbillnelson
